faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services, process, and delivery.
faq.clickToExpand: Click a question to see the answer
faq.moreQuestions: Have more questions? We're here to help.
faq.q1: What types of projects do you specialize in?
faq.a1: We specialize in a wide range of visual content creation, with particular expertise in luxury real estate, corporate events, brand storytelling, and social media content. Our team has extensive experience working with high-end properties, international conferences, and premium brands requiring sophisticated visual treatment.
faq.q2: How long does a typical video production take from start to finish?
faq.a2: Our production timeline varies based on project complexity. For real estate projects, we typically deliver final content within 5-7 business days after filming. More complex projects like corporate documentaries or event aftermovies may take 2-3 weeks. We always provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation to ensure alignment with your marketing schedule.
faq.q3: What makes your videos different from standard productions?
faq.a3: Unlike standard video productions, our content incorporates cinematic storytelling techniques, professional lighting design, and strategic narrative structure. We focus on creating an emotional connection with viewers by showcasing the essence of your brand or product—resulting in higher engagement and conversion rates.
faq.q4: Do you provide raw footage along with the edited content?
faq.a4: While our standard packages include fully edited and color-graded final content, we can provide select raw footage as an add-on service. We maintain a secure archive of all project assets for 6 months, allowing clients to request additional edits or formats during that period.
faq.q5: How do you handle multilingual content for international audiences?
faq.a5: We offer comprehensive multilingual solutions including subtitling, voice-over, and translation services in English, French, German, and Italian. For clients targeting international audiences, we recommend creating versions in multiple languages to maximize market reach and appeal to diverse demographics across Europe and beyond.

description.duoDesc1: We're Alex and Dorian, co-founders of Prestige Production—a creative studio built on a shared passion for visual storytelling.
description.duoDesc2: At Prestige Production, we combine technical expertise with a creative mindset to craft videos that not only look great but communicate purpose and meaning.
description.duoDesc3: Whether it's promotional content, cinematic montages, or brand storytelling—our focus is always on quality, clarity, and lasting impression.

description.dorianDesc1: Dorian is the eye behind our cinematic storytelling.
description.dorianDesc2: With a passion for architecture and design, he turns properties into elegant narratives.
description.dorianDesc3: He leads the visual direction and ensures every project feels unique, premium, and strategic.

description.alexDesc1: Alex is the technical brain of the operation.
description.alexDesc2: From drones to editing suites, he handles it all — ensuring crisp footage, smooth edits, and flawless delivery.
description.alexDesc3: He's obsessed with quality and elevates every video to meet professional-grade standards.

projects.penthouseSeoTitle: Real Estate Video Production Zurich | Property Marketing Switzerland | Prestige Production
projects.penthouseSeoDescription: We create videos that sell properties in Zurich and across Switzerland. Professional real estate content that gets results for agents and developers.
projects.penthouseSeoKeywords: real estate video Zurich, property video Switzerland, real estate marketing Zurich, property videos Switzerland, real estate photography Zurich, property marketing videos Switzerland
projects.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

penthouse.title: A Penthouse Story
penthouse.description: We worked with Zurich Sotheby's to showcase one of Zurich's most impressive properties. This 304 square meter penthouse sits on top of the Mobimo Tower, and we created a complete video package that really captures what makes this place special.
penthouse.mainVideoDesc: Take a look at the full video walkthrough of this amazing property
penthouse.featuresDesc: Key elements that made this project exceptional
penthouse.reelsDesc: Quick videos made for Instagram and other social platforms

results.topPerformerDesc: Second best reel ever posted on Zurich Sotheby's Instagram
results.growthDesc: Compared to their usual posts, plus lots of new followers

penthouse.whyUsTitle: Why Video Content Actually Works for Real Estate
penthouse.whyUsDesc: Here's what the data shows about using professional video to sell properties

whyUs.benefit1Desc: Good video content weeds out the tire kickers and brings in people who are actually ready to buy
whyUs.benefit2Desc: When people see professional videos, they understand the value better and are willing to pay more
whyUs.benefit3Desc: Social media videos reach buyers from all over the world who would never see regular listings
whyUs.benefit4Desc: Most agents still use basic photos. Video makes you look way more professional
whyUs.proofDesc: Real numbers from the Zurich penthouse videos
whyUs.testimonial: The video content completely changed how people saw our property. We got inquiries from international buyers we never would have reached otherwise.

penthouse.ctaTitle: Want to Try This for Your Property?
penthouse.ctaDesc: We can create the same kind of content that gets results for your listings and helps you close more deals.

penthouse.interviewsDesc: We've had the privilege to sit down with trail-blazing CEOs and forward-thinking investors who are reshaping the mining ecosystem. Dive in for candid insights you won't hear anywhere else.

paragraph1.part3: with bold cinematic craft to create visuals that stop thumbs and turn heads.

paragraph2.part1: From the first storyboard to the final colour grade, every frame is engineered to

responsibilities.0: Conduct stakeholder workshop to capture objectives, audience, and key messages.
responsibilities.1: Research market trends and competitor content for strategic insights.
responsibilities.2: Draft a comprehensive creative brief outlining scope, deliverables, and timelines.

responsibilities.0: Develop compelling narrative structure and write detailed script.
responsibilities.1: Design storyboard panels illustrating key scenes and camera angles.
responsibilities.2: Review and refine script/storyboard with client approvals at each stage.

responsibilities.0: Scout locations, acquire permits, and schedule shoot logistics.
responsibilities.1: Coordinate crew, equipment rental, casting talent, and wardrobe.
responsibilities.2: Create shooting schedule and call sheets for seamless production flow.

responsibilities.0: Direct on-set production, manage camera, lighting, and sound.
responsibilities.1: Guide talent performance and ensure alignment with creative vision.
responsibilities.2: Monitor and back up captured footage for quality assurance.

responsibilities.0: Edit raw footage, apply color correction, sound mixing, and graphics.
responsibilities.1: Integrate client feedback through iterative review cycles.
responsibilities.2: Finalize video master and prepare versions for different platforms.

responsibilities.0: Export videos in required formats and resolutions.
responsibilities.1: Upload to hosting platforms and optimize metadata.
responsibilities.2: Develop distribution strategy across owned and paid channels, track analytics.
